item.description:
Hi,
I hope you are fine. I have an exciting announcement. We are kicking off this season with the most popular and timely presentation to date. What everyone wants to know about foreclosures. This is an information packed exposition, by the foremost expert on Ma. foreclosures. Ron Bouchard, a man with such an extensive bio that I will put it into another email. You won't want to miss this informative, timely, valuable revelation of many unknown and mostly unexplored ideas that could make you wealthy, beyond your wildest dreams.
This event will fill up fast. If you are interested, please respond now. I don't want you to be disappointed, by being shut out. dale

P.S. Several of us who have profited from this material, will be on hand to tell our stories.
item.name: The Greater Boston Real Estate Investing Club October Meetup
